UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA
ACADEMIC COMMUNICATIONS FACILITY
LOS ANGELES 24, CALIFORNIA
Marcjr^, #63
Mr. Frank Schooley
Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Frank:
Believe it or not I finally dug down to the bottom of the pile of stuff
that accumulated while I was in Australia and discovered your December
questionnaire. Assuming it is too late to contribute at this late date,
I merely tender an apology. If, however, you want my contribution
still, I will be glad to provide.
Cordially,
Rudy Bretz, Head
Planning and Development
Educational TV
RB/f
